title: How to unsubscribe from Kyivstar TV
description: Here's how to cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription through various methods, including iOS, Android, USSD codes, and the web portal.

web.title: Unsubscribe via My Kyivstar Web Portal
web.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription via the web portal:

*   Go to the My Kyivstar web portal (account.kyivstar.ua).
*   Log in with your phone number.
*   Click on the Services tab.
*   Find Active Packages.
*   Click Disconnect or Deactivate next to the Kyivstar TV subscription you want to cancel.
*   Confirm the cancellation via SMS if prompted.

app.title: Unsubscribe via App Store (iOS)
app.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription via the App Store:

*   Open Settings on your iPhone.
*   Tap on your Apple ID, then select Subscriptions to cancel via the App Store.

seo_text: Cancel Kyivstar TV subscription, Kyivstar TV cancellation, unsubscribe Kyivstar TV, stop Kyivstar TV subscription, Kyivstar TV billing, manage Kyivstar TV account
